title: Driver Dashboard eligible orders feed rendering hardening

requirements.summary: Ensure Driver Dashboard loads and renders the eligible orders feed via useListEligibleDriverOrders with robust status/field rendering and no runtime crashes.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the Driver Dashboard triggers useListEligibleDriverOrders and renders either: loading skeletons, an error alert, an empty-state alert, or the table of orders, without crashing.
Each eligible order row renders order id, item count, formatted totalAmount, formatted createdAt, and a status badge based on the returned OrderRecord.status shape.

file_operations.description: Harden eligible orders table rendering to avoid runtime errors when OrderRecord fields are missing/undefined and to tolerate backend status semantics changes. Keep user-facing text in English. Continue using existing shadcn-ui primitives already imported (Card, Alert, Table, Badge, Skeleton) for consistent UI; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
